page.title: 04Industry.
page.content: Amongst the major industries in our area are Amersham International, British Telecom, Asda Superstore, Securicor,Royal Mail Depot, Pugh's Nursery and Steetly Quarry.Amersham International was built in 1980, and has 560 employees, mainly chemists and biochemists working in laboratories. They produce chemicals used in hospitals to analyse blood and treat diseases.It is right along the M4. British Telecom was built at Coryton in 1974.They employ 350 people as operators,instructors,secretaries,typi sts,clerks and mechanics.Steetley Quarry is 30 years old employing 40 people directly and 140 indirectly. They make lime for agriculture,breeze blocks and ready mixed concrete.Pugh's Nursery employs 9 people and sells a variety of shrubs,plants,flowers garden tools and furniture.
